articles.title: Tom Brady: Matthew Stafford’s ‘dream season’ should be enough to beat Drake Maye for MVP
articles.description:
"Drake's got a long career ahead. I'm sure he's going to have many opportunities. I'm going to say Matthew Stafford."

The post Tom Brady: Matthew Stafford’s ‘dream season’ should be enough to beat Drake Maye for MVP appeared first on Boston.com.
